original_text:
You have increased the number of your merchants
    till they are more numerous than the stars in the sky,
but like locusts they strip the land
    and then fly away.
korean_text: 네가 네 상인을 하늘의 별보다 많게 하였으나 느치가 날개를 펴서 날아감과 같고

sentences.original_text: You have increased the number of your merchants
till they are more numerous than the stars in the sky
but like locusts they strip the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 메뚜기처럼 땅을 황폐하게 하고
